title: 7: Iliad book XXII
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: The twenty-second book of the Iliad is a microcosm of the whole. The symbolism in this chapter captures all the major themes of the book.
itunes:author: A.J. & Graeme
itunes:subtitle: A microcosm of the Iliad
